A

ApiConnector - Class in com.bestbuy.sdk.api
Implements and handles connection with API, providing GET operation
Uses @Log4j to log events
ApiConnector(String) - Constructor in ApiConnector
Constructor

B

BestBuyClient - Class in com.bestbuy.sdk.api
BestBuy API Client, gives access to all the operations available in API definition
You can find complete Best Buy API documentation here
Uses @Log4j to log events
BestBuyClient() - Constructor in BestBuyClient
Default constructor, will use a system variable to load your API key (BBY_API_KEY)
URLs used will be set by default in constructor BestBuyClient(String, String, String)
You can check URLs in Best Buy API Documentation here

C

ClientConfiguration - Class in com.bestbuy.sdk.api

D

doGet(String, Map) - Method in ApiConnector
Get resource from API, using base Url and adding path and parameters

E

Examples - Class in com.bestbuy
BestBuyClient class examples for all methods, with queries examples.

getBaseBetaUrl() - Method in ClientConfiguration

getCategories(String, Map) - Method in BestBuyClient
Get Category list from API
getDefaultApiKey() - Method in ClientConfiguration
getOpenBoxProducts(String, Map) - Method in BestBuyClient
Get Open Box list from API
getProducts(String, Map) - Method in BestBuyClient
Get product list from API
getRecommendations(String, String, Map) - Method in BestBuyClient
Get Recommendations list from API
getRecommendationsBySKU(long, String, String, Map) - Method in BestBuyClient
Get Recommendations for a specific Product from API
getReviews(String, Map) - Method in BestBuyClient
Get Reviews list from API
getStores(String, String, Map) - Method in BestBuyClient
Get Stores list from API, providing a products Query
